entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
